revised_title: Illumination and the Burning of Bodies by the Sun
tldr: The author discusses a method to illuminate objects in any desired proportion using a large object-glass, called a planetary glass. They also explore the distances required to burn bodies by the Sun and the differences in light received by planets. The author mentions that we must be seven times closer to the Sun to be in danger of burning, and they recommend using burning-glasses to test the amount of light in hot countries.
